resources.string: Please enter your username and password
Inspired by communication app, connecting people via internet such as Zalo, Messenger, etc. GodChat Project was born in order to connecting people with better effiency.
With improved anonymous login features and Dark Mode support for those with weak eyes, Godchat is the best choice in Vietnam Internet Community

Besides good features like real time communicating, Godchat also have the anonymous features to hide real identity of user, so that they can show their true color without worrying about exposing their secret. And Dark Mode is good also.
